Experience

Web Developer

BobCAD-CAM

Designed, coded, built, and maintained web sites using Vue.js & PHP. Evaluated code to ensure its validity, proper structure, meeting of industry standards, and compatiblility with browsers, devices, or operating systems. Created new and edited existing web & social media content and collaborated with marketing team members to produce original copy and graphics.

April 2018 - October 2018

Web Developer

Freelancing

Advertise my graphic, web design, & development skills on Etsy, Instagram, and YouTube to obtain clients. Once a client has enlisted my services, I follow a detailed plan on designing, developing, and deploying client sites and logo design projects.

April 2017 - Present

3D Modeling Technician

Master Consulting Engineers

Operated computer-aided drafting (CAD) software to produce structural designs, working drawings, charts, forms, and records. Used AutoCAD(2D) & Revit(3D) to draft rough and detailed scale plans for foundations, buildings, and structures, based on preliminary concepts, sketches, engineering calculations, specification sheets, and other data. Obtained and assembled data to complete structural designs, visiting job sites to compile measurements as necessary.

April 2016 - April 2017

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, my favorite pastimes include reading historical romance novels (sheepish grin), DIY projects (need a t-shirt?), and new experiences with my daughters and our fur baby Smokey. I prefer spring, summer, and fall (no winter please). During the lovely aforementioned seasons here in Florida, I looove hitting the beaches, running, canoeing, and naps in the hammock.

When forced indoors, I doodle with pencil and paper, then transfer those designs into Inkscape or Illustrator. I've also dabbled in animation, 3D modeling, photography, and videography. I'm also super interested in ethical hacking. Additionally, I'm a YouTube Creator ( check out my channel: Meet Nerdy Kat on YouTube! ) Oh, and I love cooking and eating too... Last but not least I spend every other second I get exploring the latest technology advancements in the wonderful world of web development.
